# Medium Offenses ## 1. Arbitrariness / abuse of authority Unauthorized actions or abuse of granted powers, including actions by Imperial Guard representatives and other officials, resulting in violation of other persons' rights or established order.
## 2. Sabotage Intentional disruption of the operation of facilities, services, or processes with the aim of causing damage, destabilizing order, or hindering their functioning.
## 3. Robbery (From 1 gold) Open seizure of someone else's property of high value using threat, force, or coercion, without bringing the situation to murder.
## 4. Kidnapping (Without subsequent murder) Unlawful capture, detention, or forced relocation of a person, depriving them of freedom of movement, regardless of the method of influence, without subsequent murder (except for lawful actions of the Imperial Guard within its authority).
## 5. Creation of illegal cults/societies Organization or management of associations operating outside the law, covertly or contrary to the established order, including cults, secret unions, and prohibited communities.
## 6. Infliction of medium/severe harm to health Causing physical or magical harm that resulted in a critical condition of the victim or such a condition in which they are unable to continue independent actions and need assistance from others.
